profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2021-04-10 19:24:46 -0400.

repository.corpname: Digital Collections and Archives, Tufts University

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection is not processed. It is arranged in one series: Unprocessed accessions.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection contains one campaign poster "Hon. C. Neal Barney for Congress;" photo album with photos of Barney, his wife, and two children; and one framed daguerreotype of Barney later in life. All items are undated.

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: Charles Neal Barney graduated from Tufts College of Arts & Sciences in 1895 and received an honorary degree in 1909.

processinfo.head: Processing status
processinfo.p: This collection is minimally processed and may not be available for research.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: This collection may require review before it is available for use. Please contact DCA for further details.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This series contains one campaign poster "Hon. C. Neal Barney for Congress;" photo album with photos of Barney, his wife, and two children; and one framed daguerreotype of Barney later in life. All items are undated.
